combo.assistance_taxonomy: Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region
Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region
Medical Device Regulatory-Admin Classification by Region

combo.assistance_dql: select v.alias_value, v.locale_value from d2_dictionary d , d2_dictionary_value v where v.object_name like '%$value(country_code)' and d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name ='Medical Device Notified Bodies' and d.alias_name= 'Notified Body Code' and v.i_position = d.i_position ORDER BY locale_value enable (ROW_BASED)

SELECT distinct object_name AS name, locale_value as label_en FROM d2_dictionary_value WHERE dictionary_name = 'Regulatory Submission Type' and object_name in (select b.object_name from d2_dictionary_value a, d2_dictionary_value b, dm_relation r where a.dictionary_name = 'Geographic Regions' and a.object_name = '$value(region)' and a.r_object_id = r.parent_id and b.r_object_id = r.child_id and r.relation_name = 'D2_TAXONOMY' and r.description like 'Regulatory-Submission type by Region%') and any locale_value is not nullstring order by locale_value enable(ROW_BASED)
select distinct submission_number from cd_reg_submission_info where application_description='$value(application_description)' and a_status='Active' order by 1 desc enable(return_top 1)

comment.label_en: Uncheck the above 'Validate...' checkbox to change the Submission Number.

combo.assistance_dql: select 'OK' from dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where '$value(submission_number)' != ' ' and not exists (select * from cd_reg_submission_info where application_description = '$value(application_description)' and upper(submission_number) = upper('$value(submission_number)')) union select 'Invalid - A duplicate submission number exists for this application.' from dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where '$value(submission_number)' != ' ' and exists (select * from cd_reg_submission_info where application_description = '$value(application_description)' and upper(submission_number) = upper('$value(submission_number)')) union select 'Invalid â€“ Submission number cannot be blank.' from dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where '$value(submission_number)' = ' '
